body_html:
I see.
I removed those checks, and handled that case in Conv, because it was needed for Conv double backward. When Conv with stride > 1, dilation > 1 happens, the double-backward will involve this condition, if I remember.

body:
I see.
I removed those checks, and handled that case in Conv, because it was needed for Conv double backward. When Conv with stride > 1, dilation > 1 happens, the double-backward will involve this condition, if I remember.
